transArray.content: There is a free nucleic acid testing point at the door of the hotel, which is two to three hundred meters away. There is a small park to the east. You can also take a walk in the park at night. The noodles cooked for breakfast in the morning are also delicious and there are many kinds of noodles. Mineral water is provided free of charge along with coffee and tea bags. The newly opened store has good facilities and location.

Hello, dear guests, may your four seasons be filled with flowers and plants in spring, little skirts in summer, dusk and fallen leaves in autumn, and sunshine and warmth in winter. I love you little man.
